topics.body:
Lucky Star ep7 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]wait whAT THE HECK KONATA

STOP IT STOP IT STOP IT

"HIIIIGGGHHH SCHOOOOL. HIIIIGGGHHH SCHOOOOL."

Konata's notes are hard to read, and Tsukasa is just bad at taking notes, there is no hope XD

*staaaaaare*

BUTTS

Tsukasa has a cell phone... knowing her, this will not end well

and yep. figures, she doesn't know how to use it :P

well that's oddly gruesome, ants dragging parts of a dead cicada away

phone troubles

phone failure: death by washing machine

*draw draw draw draw*

"OH. I BREATHE FIRE, HUH?" yes

"The new issue of Fullmetal came out today" Alchemist or Panic?

LUCKY CHANNE- wot

wow Akira is pissed

TWIN DRILLS

"I'd like to apologize ahead of time if my singing hurts your ears" and it's the first karaoke that isn't hurting my ears

"Tsukasa here- time's up?" what is with this episode[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

welp this episode was quite bizarre
